question: The 38th India Carpet Expo was held in which of the following places of India?
explanation: The 38th India Carpet Expo was held in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. The Carpet Export Promotion Council (CEPC) is the organizer of the event. The main objective of the event was the promotion of the cultural heritage and weaving skills of Indian hand-made carpets and other floor coverings. It is one of the largest handmade carpet fairs in Asia.
